meanings.definition: A deep-sea fish with dark skin and oily flesh.
meanings.sent1: The sablefish swam gracefully in the deep ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious dish using sablefish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sablefish bring a flashlight to the underwater party? To show off its dark skin!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as dark and mysterious as a sablefish in the depths of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The sablefish's oily flesh glistened under the moonlight, a true marvel of the ocean.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this fish, often used in cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The sablefish fillet was tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's signature dish featured sablefish as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sablefish refuse to share its recipe? It was a little shellfish!
meanings.sent4: The sablefish melted in her mouth like butter on a warm day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sablefish filled the kitchen, enticing everyone with its savory scent.
